__e: Well, you say that, J. Edgar. I have to take it seriously.
You know, the inebriate in the bar said that J. Edgar Hoover, who was the ex-head of the FBI in our world, was President on this world for 22 years, until the time he died.
I don't mean to cast aspersions on J. Edgar, but he was never a man to shun the public eye.
And, of course, right away, I connected with Michael J. Fox as far as just a figure that I could look up to.
[Tinker] What was really cool was that on the same day he put on the shoe in the movie, we delivered to Michael J. Fox the first-ever real-life self-lacing shoe.
- The minute Michael J. Fox was in it, it was clear a very good decision had been made, because it all started working then.
